biolockj.util

Class NextflowUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.NextflowUtil

  • public class NextflowUtil
extends Object
    This utility builds the Nextflow main.nf used in AWS pipelines.

                              throws Exception
        Call this method to build the Nextflow main.nf for the current pipeline.

        Nextflow main.nf file

      • copyPipelineToEfs

        public static File copyPipelineToEfs()
                              throws Exception
        Copy the initialized pipeline to EFS. The aws_manager can then be launched with updated $BLJ_PROJ = EFS parent directory.
        Returns:
        File EFS Pipeline directory
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur copying the pipeline.

        Throws:

      • getNextflowLines

        protected static List<String> getNextflowLines(File template)
                                        throws Exception
        Build the main.nf lines from the template file by replacing several parameters.
        Parameters:
        template - Generated .main.nf template
        Returns:
        List of lines to save in final main.nf
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
